activities: As an organisation we provide a software as a service facility whereby our customers may store information such as names of their employees, third parties, incident management activities etc. here: https://www.onefacility.com. As a global solution provider one of our datacentres is located in Boston MA and with our expanding global customer base we are soon to take on European sites for some our USA Multinationals.  To therefore ensure that we can continue to host the information in Boston we have felt that it is appropriate that we show how committed to the safety and protection of the data which we may process, both ours and on behalf of our customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) ; For all other types of data:
BBB EU Safe Harbor (www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor)
